snippet: Nearly two dozen Egyptian activists, arrested at a protest march last weekend, will remain in pretrial detention until Sept. 13, a judge ruled.
lead_paragraph: Nearly two dozen Egyptian activists, arrested at a protest march last weekend, will remain in pretrial detention until Sept. 13, a judge ruled.

headline.main: Pretrial Detention Extended for Egyptians Who Protested Ban on Protests

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
